mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_CTRCTCERTREL (CTRCTCERTRELSGMTSEQNO, CTRCTCERTRELSEQNO, BRERTYPE, CERTRELNAME, CERTRELIDTYPE, CERTRELIDNUM, REPORTFLAG) values (#{CtrctCertRelSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CtrctCertRelSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BrerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CertRelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CertRelIDType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CertRelIDNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select CTRCTCERTRELSGMTSEQNO, CTRCTCERTRELSEQNO, BRERTYPE, CERTRELNAME, CERTRELIDTYPE, CERTRELIDNUM, REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_CTRCTCERTREL

select CTRCTCERTRELSGMTSEQNO, CTRCTCERTRELSEQNO, BRERTYPE, CERTRELNAME, CERTRELIDTYPE, CERTRELIDNUM,REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_CTRCTCERTREL where CTRCTCERTRELSGMTSEQNO = #{CtrctCertRelSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_CTRCTCERTRELM (CTRCTCERTRELSGMTSEQNO, CTRCTCERTRELSEQNO, BRERTYPE, CERTRELNAME, CERTRELIDTYPE, CERTRELIDNUM, REPORTFLAG, ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS) select CTRCTCERTRELSGMTSEQNO, CTRCTCERTRELSEQNO, BRERTYPE, CERTRELNAME, CERTRELIDTYPE, CERTRELIDNUM, '0', ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS from PBCRS_REPORT_CTRCTCERTREL where CTRCTCERTRELSGMTSEQNO = #{CtrctCertRelSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CTRCTCERTRELSEQNO = #{CtrctCertRelSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
